control.description-key: Multi-Select Lookup Control for Model-Driven Apps

property.name: selectedItems
property.description-key: The lookup field bound to this control

property.name: hiddenField
property.description-key: A Multiple Lines of Text field to store selected lookup records as JSON

property.name: recordNamesField
property.description-key: A Single Line of Text field to store names of selected records

property.name: LookupEntityLogicalName
property.description-key: Logical name of the target entity (e.g. contact, account)

property.name: LookupEntityDisplayName
property.description-key: Display name for the New Record button (e.g. Contact)

property.name: NameFieldLogicalName
property.description-key: Logical name of the display field (e.g. fullname, name)
